attributes.action: Urge West Sussex County Council to take measures to reduce the speed of traffic on the A272 in Scaynes Hill including removing the dual lane Eastern gateway to the village and extending the 30mph limit to the cricket ground at the Western gateway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scaynes Hill is a village in West Sussex with a population of around a thousand people. The village is divided by the busy A272 road. 

According to a traffic survey by West Sussex County Council in 2006, a two way traffic flow of 11377 vehicles pass through the village every day.

There are no traffic calming measures in place in the village and the 30mph limit is widely ignored by passing motorists.
